HSP_ACCOUNT.name: HSP_ACCOUNT
HSP_ACCOUNT.description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Account (HAR) and Claim (CLM) master files. It will exclude professional billing hospital accounts created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: ACCT_CLASS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description: The hospital account's account class.

columns.name: ACCT_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The hospital account's financial class.
entries: Sent to Consolidated Self-Pay Service Area

columns.name: ACCT_SLFPYST_HA_C_NAME
columns.description: The hospital account's self-pay status.

columns.name: ACCT_BILLSTS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the status of the hospital account. If this is a professional billing default hospital account, this column always returns 4 (Billed).

columns.name: ACCT_ZERO_BAL_DT
columns.description: This column stores the date the hospital account went to a zero balance. This may be empty for older accounts, as Zero Balance Date (I HAR 244) had not always been available.

columns.name: ADM_DATE_TIME
columns.description: This column stores the admission date and time associated with the hospital account. The admission date and time (I HAR 400/405) are first pulled from the coding information on the hospital account. If this data is not stored on the hospital account yet, then this will pull the data from the primary patient encounter for the hospital account. Depending on a hospital billing system definition setting, this will pull either the admission date and time (I EPT 18850/18851) or the arrival date and time (I EPT 10820/10815). If the arrival date and time is not available than the admission date and time will be used.

columns.name: ADM_DEPARMENT_ID
columns.description: The department of the account's admission event.

columns.name: ADM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The location of the account's admission event.

columns.name: ATTENDING_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the attending provider stored on the hospital account. See column PROV_ID in table HSP_ATND_PROV if coding has not been performed on this hospital account. Alternatively, see V_ARHB_HSP_ACCOUNT_ADDL_INFO for the calculated value for this column based on both hospital account and encounter data. This view should be used to maintain backwards compatibility with reports created before upgrading to the Summer 2009 release.

columns.name: COMPLETION_DT_TM
columns.description: The date and time when abstracting was completed for the hospital account.

columns.name: CVG_LIST_SELECT_YN
columns.description: Denotes whether coverages have been put on the hospital account.

columns.name: DISCH_DATE_TIME
columns.description: This column stores the discharge date and time associated with the hospital account. The discharge date and time (I HAR 425/430) are first pulled from the coding information on the hospital account. If this data is not stored on the hospital account yet, then this will pull the discharge date and time (I EPT 18855/18856) that is stored on the primary patient encounter for the hospital account.

columns.name: DISCH_DEPT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the discharge department on the hospital account.

columns.name: DISCH_LOC_ID
columns.description: The discharge location stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: GUAR_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the street address of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: GUAR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: GUAR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_CITY
columns.description: The city portion of the address of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_DOB
columns.description: The date of birth of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_HOME_PHONE
columns.description: The home phone number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_SSN
columns.description: The social security number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PREBILL_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account's prebilled bucket.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account's self-pay bucket.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area stored on the hospital account.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ
columns.description: The total of all adjustments on the hospital account.

columns.name: TOT_CHGS
columns.description: The total of all charges on the hospital account.

columns.name: UNDISTRB_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for a hospital account's undistributed bucket.

columns.name: PATIENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient status (discharge disposition) category ID for the hospital account.

columns.name: ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The point of origin category ID (admission source) for the hospital account.

columns.name: ADMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The admission type category ID for the hospital account.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary payer associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary benefit plan associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: NUM_OF_CHARGES
columns.description: The total number of charge transactions posted to the hospital account. This number may include inactive charges, such as reversals and reversed charges.

columns.name: CODING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The coding status category ID for the hospital account.

columns.name: CODING_STS_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user when the coding status for the hospital account last changed.

columns.name: CODING_STS_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CODING_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time that the coding status for the hospital account was last changed.

columns.name: ABSTRACT_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last changed the abstracting status of the hospital account.

columns.name: ABSTRACT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: FIRST_BILLED_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date when the account moved to the billed state for the first time.

columns.name: BASE_INV_NUM
columns.description: The base invoice number for this row.

columns.name: INV_NUM_SEQ_CTR
columns.description: The invoice number sequence counter for the hospital account.

columns.name: SBO_TOT_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains the combined total balance of Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) transactions on the hospital account, including charges, payments and adjustments in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: SBO_TOTAL_CHARGES
columns.description: Combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) charges on the hospital account in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: SBO_TOTAL_PAYMENTS
columns.description: Combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) payments on the hospital account in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: SBO_TOTAL_ADJ
columns.description: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) adjustments on the hospital account in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: SBO_PREBILL_BALANC
columns.description: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) prebilled balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: SBO_INS_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) insurance balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: SBO_SP_BAL
columns.description: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) self pay balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).

columns.name: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN
columns.description: This column stores whether the hospital account has an open denial record.

columns.name: OPEN_RMK_BDC_YN
columns.description: This column stores whether the hospital account has an open remark record.

columns.name: OPEN_COR_BDC_YN
columns.description: This column stores whether the hospital account has an open correspondence record.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who created the hospital account.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CODING_USER
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last changed the coding status of the hospital account. This is frequently used to join to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: CODING_USER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: FIRST_SELF_PAY_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first self-pay balance for this account.

columns.name: FIRST_FULL_SP_DT
columns.description: This field contains the first date when the self-pay balance equaled the full account balance for this account.

columns.name: PRIMARY_CONTACT
columns.description: This column stores the primary contact date (DAT) of the hospital account. It's used in many places, such as in determining the admission/discharge date of the account.

columns.name: ADMIT_TYPE_EPT_C_NAME
columns.description: Admit type as stored on patient record.

columns.name: PAT_STS_EPT_C_NAME
columns.description: Patient Status as stored on patient record.

columns.name: HAS_OPEN_OVRP_BD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the hospital account has open overpayment records.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this hospital account is self-pay.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total copay specified by insurance on payments.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COINS_AMT
columns.description: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total coinsurance specified by insurance on payments.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DED_AMT
columns.description: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total deductible specified by insurance on payments.

columns.name: TOT_INS_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of insurance payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_INS_ADJ
columns.description: The total amount of insurance adjustments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_SP_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of self-pay payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_AR_INS_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of active AR insurance payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_AR_INS_ALLOWANCES
columns.description: The total amount of active AR insurance allowance adjustments posted to this account.

columns.name: TOT_AR_SP_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of active AR self-pay payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_INS_PMTS_AND_RFNDS
columns.description: The total insurance payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.

columns.name: TOT_SP_PMTS_AND_RFNDS
columns.description: The total self-pay payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.

columns.name: TOT_PMTS_AND_RFNDS
columns.description: The total payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ_EXCL_RFNDS
columns.description: The total adjustment amount posted to the account, not including refund adjustments.

columns.name: SP_RESP_AFTER_INS
columns.description: The balance transferred to self-pay after insurance is taken into account. This does not include any self-pay discount, financial assistance, or pre-payments.

columns.name: SP_RESP_LESS_DISCOUNT
columns.description: The self-pay responsibility after any self-pay or financial assistance discounts are posted on the self-pay bucket.

columns.name: BAL_IN_FULL_SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: This column indicates whether the balances for this hospital account are entirely in self-pay. 'Y' indicates that all balances are in self-pay. 'N' or NULL indicates that there are some balances not in self-pay or the account has not been billed.

columns.name: FIRST_TX_POST_DATE
columns.description: This column is the original post date for the very first transaction that filed to this hospital account, even if that transaction has been reposted, transferred, or reversed.

merged.name: HSP_ACCT_SBO
merged.description: This table contains the single billing office (SBO) balances on the hospital account (HAR). The information is only populated in Enterprise SBO mode. SBO balances are the combined Hospital Billing and Professional Billing transaction balances on each HAR.

merged.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_2
merged.description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. This second hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, but was created as a second table to prevent HSP_ACCOUNT from getting any larger. This table will exclude professional billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.

merged.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_3
merged.description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. This third hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT and HSP_ACCOUNT_2, but was created as a third table to prevent the other tables from getting any larger. This table will exclude professional billing hospital account records created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.

merged.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_4
merged.description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. It excludes Professional Billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas. This fourth hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, HSP_ACCOUNT_2 and HSP_ACCOUNT_3.

merged.name: HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG
merged.description: This table contains billing diagnosis related group (DRG) information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

HSP_ACCOUNT.PATIENT_STATUS_C_NAME: Discharged to Home or Self Care (Routine Discharge)
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME: Non-Health Care Facility Point of Origin
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_STS_EPT_C_NAME: Home - Discharge to Home or Self Care
